name: About me
body:
HI I'm Supun Kamburugamuve, a PhD Candidate in Computer Science department at Indiana University Bloomington. My research advisor is Prof. Geoffrey Fox and my research interest includes large scale real time analysis of sensor data, distributed stream processing and control of mobile robots through cloud based processing.  

### Projects
[IoTCloud](https://github.com/iotcloud/iotcloud2) - An open source framework for IoT and Sensor Centric Applications
[CloudMooc](http://cloudmooc.appspot.com/preview) - MOOC for cloud computing
[WSO2 ESB](http://wso2.com/products/enterprise-service-bus/) - Open Source Enterprise Service Bus, project lead before leaving WSO2.

### Courses
Distributed Systems, Advanced Operating Systems, Computer Networks, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Mining, Knowledge Based Artificial Intelligence, Advanced Scientific Computing, Theory of Computing

### Technical Skills
* Languages: Core Java, C, Python, Shell Scripting, SQL, JavaScript, Matlab
* Technologies: SOA, ESB, REST, Java NIO, XML Technologies
* Frameworks: Axis2 Web Services, Apache Synapse, OSGI, JPA, Hadoop Map Reduce, JBoss Netty, Apache HTTP Core, JMS
* Databases: MySQL, Cassandra, Apache Accumulo, MongoDB  
* Apache HTTPD, Tomcat, ActiveMQ, Jetty, JSP, HTML , Jinja2, Twitter Boostrap, Angular JS, JQuery
* Tools: Maven, SVN, Git, Ant, IntelliJ Idea, Eclipse, JMeter, Apache ab, Eclipse Memory Analyzer, JProfiler
